main event: On 18 May 1966, a civilian observer noted a balloon-like object traveling at high speed in the west sky over Chicago, Illinois.
interesting points: The object was initially seen as a yellow ball at a high altitude,The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes before the object disappeared behind a building,The object was described as round and lacking any tail or sound, It was reported under Project Blue Book as a potential satellite sighting, Observers noted there was no trace of the object after it disappeared.
witness description: A civilian housewife, age 70, who reported reliable accounts.
